alert.note: Alert for Dimmit; Frio; Kinney; Maverick; Val Verde; Zavala (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 16 at 1:28AM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of prolonged sub-freezing temperatures as low as 10 degrees. * WHERE...Val Verde, Kinney, Maverick, Zavala, Frio and Dimmit Counties. * WHEN...Through 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While widespread sub-freezing temperatures are currently in place this morning, Tuesday night into Wednesday morning will be even colder for some areas, especially across low-lying valleys.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Dimmit; Frio; Kinney; Maverick; Val Verde; Zavala
